ns16:DISCIPLINE.KARMARITUAL: Please insert a short description of your Karma Ritual. It have to last for 30 minutes
ns16:DISCIPLINE.HALFMAGIC: caring weapons/ armor; recognize types of weapons/ armor used or worn different Namegivers; Craftsman Tests making/ repairing forged metal items; Skill: Craft Armor, Craft Weapon; Fifth Circle: can create living armor; (PG p.55)
